title: Tethereum
author: Tethereum
content: Hi everyone, We all know how frustrating it is how every exchange is requiring KYC nowadays. We're offering the opportunity to buy BTC for euro/usd/gbp through bank transfer, without KYC. Few details: Min. 500$ Max. $10.000Method: Wire, SEPA, Worldwide Bank Transfer, Payoneer, Wise.Fees: 10% Currency: EUR/GBP/USDAvailable Crypto: BTC/ETH/USDT/USDCIf you want we can use escrow, no problem for us. You can contact me on telegram @bidcap or send me a PM here .
